page.title: 13A390 _ PRESENT USE
page.content: The A390 is now a busy East_West route linking{Tavistock, Callington and{Liskeard.}A survey carried out on a Wednesday lunchtime recorded{46 cars and{9 lorries}passing over Newbridge in just{10 minutes. Though the road has 2 lanes, it winds a lot and{overtaking}is difficult throughout the block. The road is steep on both sides of the Lynher Valley and slow moving lorries can cause{traffic hold ups. At{Newbridge,}the local residents felt there was too much traffic on the road. The{noise}and{vibrations affected their lives and the steep slopes and narrow bridge caused {dangers,}especially in winter when{ice is a threat (eg. in 1983 when 3 serious accidents occurred in a fortnight).
